full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 118 of 228 794 LC2VMAX4 Alessi - Direct 1 right -- 2 A. Yes, this was -- 3 Q. -- what would be to your right? 4 A. It was a hallway, all the way towards Mr. Epstein's bedroom. It was a two sets of double doors, one here and one here. And it also was his door. I think his door, if I remember correctly, was a single door going into his room. 8 Q. Let me clear this. I'm going to circle the rectangle slightly to the right of the spiral. 10 Can you tell us what that area is? 11 A. This is the hallway. That is a hallway. I think it was a table with some lights. 13 Q. And where does that hallway lead to? 14 A. That hallway leads to Mr. Epstein's door, bedroom. 15 Q. Is that hallway separated from the staircase by double doors? 16 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. I'd like to move now to the master bedroom, which I've circled on the right side of this exhibit. 20 Would you please describe the master bedroom for us. 21 A. Yes, it was a very large master bedroom. At the left of the -- the bed was situated right here in the center. To the left of the room was the entrance with a door into his bathroom. 24 25 Q. Whose bathroom was that? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012403
